reason: The node states 'DEPENDENCIES: BG (2020) Theorem 1.1 and Proposition 4.1; node 1.2 (setup); node 1.5.4 (properties of Z_eps)' but does not formally declare dependencies on its sibling nodes 1.6.2.10.2.1 and 1.6.2.10.2.3.3 in the af framework, even though these are the actual logical inputs. The citation of 'BG (2020) Proposition 4.1' is also suspect per the numbering challenge on node 1.6.2.10.2.3.3. These are bookkeeping issues only; the mathematical content is correct.
